targets.rawSql:
with workflows as (
  select
    *,
    case when job1 like 'success' then 1 when job1 like 'in_progress' then 2 when job1 like 'queued' then 2 when job1 like 'waiting' then 2 when job1 like 'None' then 4 when job1 like 'time_out' then 3 else 0 end as job_1,
    case when job2 like 'success' then 1 when job2 like 'in_progress' then 2 when job2 like 'queued' then 2 when job2 like 'waiting' then 2 when job2 like 'None' then 4 when job2 like 'time_out' then 3 else 0 end as job_2,
    case when job3 like 'success' then 1 when job3 like 'in_progress' then 2 when job3 like 'queued' then 2 when job3 like 'waiting' then 2 when job3 like 'None' then 4 when job3 like 'time_out' then 3 else 0 end as job_3,
    case when job4 like 'success' then 1 when job4 like 'in_progress' then 2 when job4 like 'queued' then 2 when job4 like 'waiting' then 2 when job4 like 'None' then 4 when job4 like 'time_out' then 3 else 0 end as job_4,
    case when job5 like 'success' then 1 when job5 like 'in_progress' then 2 when job5 like 'queued' then 2 when job5 like 'waiting' then 2 when job5 like 'None' then 4 when job5 like 'time_out' then 3 else 0 end as job_5,
    case when job6 like 'success' then 1 when job6 like 'in_progress' then 2 when job6 like 'queued' then 2 when job6 like 'waiting' then 2 when job6 like 'None' then 4 when job6 like 'time_out' then 3 else 0 end as job_6,
    case when job7 like 'success' then 1 when job7 like 'in_progress' then 2 when job7 like 'queued' then 2 when job7 like 'waiting' then 2 when job7 like 'None' then 4 when job7 like 'time_out' then 3 else 0 end as job_7,
    case when job8 like 'success' then 1 when job8 like 'in_progress' then 2 when job8 like 'queued' then 2 when job8 like 'waiting' then 2 when job8 like 'None' then 4 when job8 like 'time_out' then 3 else 0 end as job_8,
    case when job9 like 'success' then 1 when job9 like 'in_progress' then 2 when job9 like 'queued' then 2 when job9 like 'waiting' then 2 when job9 like 'None' then 4 when job9 like 'time_out' then 3 else 0 end as job_9,
    case when job10 like 'success' then 1 when job10 like 'in_progress' then 2 when job10 like 'queued' then 2 when job10 like 'waiting' then 2 when job10 like 'None' then 4 when job10 like 'time_out' then 3 else 0 end as job_10
  from
    github_workflows
)
select
  job_name,
  job_1,
  job_2,
  job_3,
  job_4,
  job_5,
  job_6,
  job_7,
  job_8,
  job_9,
  job_10
from
  workflows;
